review_title: Pretty good company to work for while in college
job_title: Associate Purchasing Coordinator in Amherst, MA
pros:
- nice coworkers
- good location
- easy commute
cons:
- difficult to gain more responsibility
- really depends on who is managing you, but many other students took advantage of their supervisor and really did not do much.
